main event: Two witnesses observed a round object, described as the size of an auto headlight, for about 10 minutes near Minot, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object emitted a very bright light and alternated between white and bright red colors., The witnesses noted apparent up and down movements of the object but no horizontal movement., The sighting occurred at a low altitude., The observation was made at a distance of approximately half a mile., The witnesses were two civilian women, aged 55 and 80, residing near Minot.
witness description: Two civilian women, aged 55 and 80, both housewives residing in rural Minot.
